awardEventDetails.description: Peter Jackson (screenplay/director) - Fran Walsh (screenplay) - Philippa Boyens (screenplay) - J.R.R. Tolkien (based on the book)

awardEventDetails.title: 2004 Winner AFI Award
awardEventDetails.description: (THE LORD OF THE RINGS: THE RETURN OF THE KING punctuates the greatest trilogy in American film with an exclamation point. Peter Jackson proves himself to be the true magician of this masterpiece, for only a wizard could summon all the forces of American film three times and utilize them to such astounding success. Against all odds, Jackson met the challenge of visualizing J.R.R. Tolkien's beloved classics for a demanding, global audience.)

AFI Awards, USA

2004 Winner AFI Award
Movie of the Year
(THE LORD OF THE RINGS: THE RETURN OF THE KING punctuates the greatest trilogy in American film with an exclamation point. Peter Jackson proves himself to be the true magician of this masterpiece, for only a wizard could summon all the forces of American film three times and utilize them to such astounding success. Against all odds, Jackson met the challenge of visualizing J.R.R. Tolkien's beloved classics for a demanding, global audience.)
